TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Rahu’, title = Rahu’, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rahu’} }

S.FORM: alang Rahu' ga niya mki sku Toweng si atu Hosing Ku, kwara sali buwan nya ga 84 buwan, 294 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 96% kyan ku 281 hi, binah ga,, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 4% kyan ku 13 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Tayan 90%, Amis 2%, Bunun 1%, binah lihuyan s'uli 2%. maki qu ngasal bziran, ru kyokay. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Rahu' hya' ga rgyax krahu'. tay 'zil na Rahu' hya' ga llyung. tay mkyahu' na Rahu' hya' ga rgyax krahu'. tay mkraya' na Rahu' hya' ga Hbun-sinqumi. tay 'llaw na Rahu' hya' ga Qus. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 2 kyokay. ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy maki 1 pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy. pqwasan biru 'laqi' mrkyas tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh

alang Raho' ga niya mki sko Toweng si ato Hosing Ko, kwara sali bowan nya ga 84 bowan, 294 hi ko kwara s'oli tayan. s'oli tayan pinspngan Gyencomin ga 96% kyan ko 281 hi, binah ga,, 'yat kahon sko pinspngan Gyencomin ga 4% kyan ko 13 hi nya. pinspong na linhoyan Gyencomin ga, Tayan 90%, Amis 2%, Bonon 1%, binah lihoyan s'oli 2%. maki qo ngasal bziran, ro kyokay. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Raho' hya' ga rgyax kraho'. tay 'zil na Raho' hya' ga llyong. tay mkyaho' na Raho' hya' ga rgyax kraho'. tay mkraya' na Raho' hya' ga Hbon-sinqomi. tay 'llaw na Raho' hya' ga Qos. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 2 kyokay. ssqoliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy maki 1 pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy. pqwasan biro 'laqi' mrkyas toqi 'san baso kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbaho Uboy qqmayh
